pullrequest.title: Limit the size of the transport buffers

content.raw:
Tried the same test again just now:

ran `vrc_task_2.launch` with `laser_assembler.launch` and `pub_atlas_command_fast`.  Memory footprint snapshots with `top`:

Still got about 6.5GB after a while:

~~~
22025 ubuntu    20   0 14.4g 6.5g  76m R  330 20.6 144:27.06 gzserver -s libgazebo_ros_api_plugin.so vrc_task_2.world -q -r --record_encoding=zlib --record_path=/tmp/vrc_task_2 __name:=gazeb
~~~

ran vrc_task_2.launch with laser_assembler.launch and pub_atlas_command_fast. Memory footprint snapshots with top:
